entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 10:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this evening except gusting to 60 near the water late this evening and overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except southeast 60 gusting to 80 near the water late in the morning and early afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
